SEARCH
Module LB08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
This class represents a player participating in the game. It manages the player's state, including their assigned token color, score, hand of cards, starter card, secret objective, drawn objective card choices, and various flags indicating player actions.

    • place

      public void place(StarterCard card, boolean facingUp)
      invokes the place method for the starter card in the player's game-field
      Parameters:
      card - is the starter card the player owns
      facingUp - is the orientation of the starter card

    • place

      public void place(int id, boolean facingUp, int x, int y) throws CannotPlaceCardException, CardNotInHandException
      invokes the place method for a generic placeable card in the player's game-field
      Parameters:
      id - that identifies the card
      facingUp - is the card's orientation
      x - horizontal coordinate
      y - vertical coordinate
      Throws:
      CannotPlaceCardException - thrown when the player executes an illegal placement
      CardNotInHandException - thrown when the card isn't owned by the player
